findings.description: Unrestricted borrowing / missing collateral & liquidity controls (funds drain)
findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Unrestricted borrowing / missing collateral & liquidity controls (funds drain)
findings.reasoning: The finding correctly identifies the issue with the borrow function but misclassifies it as 'Unrestricted borrowing' rather than 'reentrancy'.

findings.description: Unchecked ERC20 return values (repay without paying / inconsistent accounting)

findings.reasoning: While the finding correctly identifies the issue with unchecked ERC20 return values, it is not related to the target vulnerability of reentrancy.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability of reentrancy was not mentioned in any of the findings.

notes: The audit findings did not identify the target vulnerability of reentrancy. The findings were either partially correct or unrelated to the target vulnerability.
